#read the infant immortality file and cleaning it
```{r}




df=read.csv(file = '(NEEDS CLEAN)-infant-inmortality.csv',header=F,skip=4) #read in data, remove the first 3 rows

df=dplyr::filter(df,!is.na(V5)) #remove rows with NA values

#glimpse(df)


df=df[,-67]
df=df[,-66]    #remove the last year's data in which data is incomplete


write.table(df, file = "CLEANED-infant-mortality.csv", row.names = FALSE, na = "", col.names = FALSE, sep = ",")
#storing the data in csv file, removing row name and column name



```
